config.maxParallelJobs: Maximum number of concurrent Claude Code sessions across all projects.
config.claudeCodePath: Path to the Claude Code CLI binary. Leave empty to auto-detect from PATH.
config.claudePermissions: How AutoDev handles Claude Code tool-use permission prompts. 'skip' passes --dangerously-skip-permissions (recommended for isolated worktrees). 'allowedTools' pre-approves specific tools via --allowedTools.
config.claudePermissions.skip: Skip all permission prompts (--dangerously-skip-permissions). Recommended: each ticket runs in an isolated git worktree.
config.claudePermissions.allowedTools: Pre-approve only the tools listed in 'Claude: Allowed Tools'. Claude will not be able to use any other tools.
config.claudeAllowedTools: Tool names to pre-approve when 'Claude: Permissions' is set to 'allowedTools'. Ignored when set to 'skip'.
config.dataDir: Directory for AutoDev data (database, logs, templates). Defaults to ~/.autodev-studio.
config.logRetentionDays: Number of days to retain job log files before automatic cleanup.
config.notifications.onPlanReady: Show a notification when a plan finishes generating and is ready for review.
config.notifications.onJobComplete: Show a notification when a job completes successfully.
config.notifications.onJobFailed: Show a notification when a job fails.
config.notifications.sound: Play a sound with job completion and failure notifications.
config.defaults.planType: Default plan type for new tickets.
config.defaults.autoExecuteAfterPlan: Automatically start execution after a plan is generated, skipping the review step.
config.defaults.maxRetries: Maximum number of test-fix retry cycles after execution.
config.defaults.claudeMaxTurns: Maximum number of agentic turns per Claude Code session.
config.git.branchPrefix: Prefix for branches created by AutoDev.
config.git.autoCleanWorktrees: Automatically remove worktrees for merged or deleted tickets.
config.git.cleanAfterDays: Number of days after completion before a worktree is eligible for automatic cleanup.
